name: Finally fixed GitHub Gist
text: Phew, after a year of claiming to write the 'Google forms' gist, i finally completed it today!

name: I love you, Mom!
text: Thanks for providing me such tasty food everyday, i know it's such a thankless job, but you still keep doing it.

name: Doki Doki - Liturarture Club Game
text: Played the amazing game on Steam. The game is really a mind blowing & thought provoking experience.

name: Completed v2.0 for atb00ker.github.io
text: Completed the v2.0 for my personal website, looks beautiful and i am really happy about it.

name: Shraddha Agrawal is Back
text: Shraddha and i had a conversation after 7 months, i am really grateful to have her back in life.
